name: wickedly
content:
wickedly adverb
(BAD)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is morally bad or evil: The villain laughed wickedly from the tower where he was keeping the princess hostage. Wickedly, the company levied additional late fees on customers who were already struggling to pay their balances.

wickedly adverb
(BAD BUT ATTRACTIVE)
in a way that is slightly morally bad or bad for you, but attractive: He made us laugh with a wickedly funny story about trying to escape through an air conditioning duct. We have put together over 100 wickedly delicious recipes.
